improvement: The current tool was selected only 25.0% of the time, indicating a need to make it more appealing and distinct from other WHOIS lookup tools. The questions asked suggest that users are looking for a simple and straightforward way to retrieve WHOIS records, without requiring complex parameters or outputs. To improve this, I will focus on making the tool's name and description more memorable and descriptive, while also highlighting its ease of use.
description: Get instant WHOIS records with our lightning-fast API. Simply enter a domain name and get access to comprehensive registration details, including registrar information, contact data, and expiration dates. Our API is designed for simplicity and speed, making it the perfect choice for developers and businesses alike.
